headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOLFE, ANN BRIGNOLI

snippet: WOLFE--Ann Brignoli. April 21 in Bayside, NY. Graduated Bryant High School and Queens College, with an MA from New York University. Ann taught drama, speech, public speaking at Bryant High School. A multitude of adoring nieces and nephews will miss her deeply. Visitation at Lloyd Funeral Home, 214-43 39th Avenue, Bayside, April 24th, from 2-5pm. Mass on April 25th at 9:45am at Sacred Heart of Jesus Church, 215-35 38th Avenue, Bayside. Interment in East Hampton, NY. In lieu of flowers, please donate to Parkinson's Foundation or Queens College. 1/3
